CRUD package

Submodules

CRUD.insert module

Date: 2021-12-13 Author: Gustav Collin Rasmussen Purpose: Store weight-training data https://tinydb.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting-started.html

CRUD.insert.insert_all_logs(table, folderpath) → None

Store all training logs in database.

Parameters

  • table (TinyDB table) – A TinyDB table

  • folderpath (string) – A path to the workout log folder, from where each file will be inserted into the table

CRUD.insert.insert_log(table, log_path) → None

Store training log: log_path in database table.

Parameters

  • table (TinyDB table) – A TinyDB table

  • log_path (string) – A path to the workout log file that will be inserted into the table

CRUD.insert.insert_specific_log(date, table, workout_number=1) → None

Store a specific training log in database.

Parameters

  • date (str) – string of date in format YYYY-MM-DD

  • table (TinyDB table) – A TinyDB table

  • workout_number (int, optional) – unique identifier of the workout on a given day, in case of multiple workouts. Defaults to 1

CRUD.insert.main() → None

Insert all simulated- or 1 or more real training logs

CRUD.training module

Date: 2021-12-11 Author: Gustav Collin Rasmussen Purpose: Store and analyze weight-training data https://tinydb.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting-started.html

CRUD.training.analyze_workout(log, exercise)

Deeper analysis of workout

CRUD.training.cleanup(db, log, action) → None

Update, remove or truncate database

CRUD.training.describe_workout(log, date)

Simple summary statistics for each exercise

CRUD.training.get_all(log)

get all documents

CRUD.training.get_dates_and_muscle_groups(log)

Returns all workout dates with their corresponding muscle groups.

CRUD.training.main()
CRUD.training.show_exercise(log, exercise, date)

Show detailed data for selected exercise

CRUD.training.show_exercises(log, date)

Show all exercises for given workout date
